This game is a heap of garbage. A literal pile of shit. There is little to no balance. The meta game is entirely built around kiting. Hitboxes are a mess. There is a game hidden somewhere within this bug. Everyone should play it.
this game is very shit, and i do not recommend it to anyone
well made game with a lot of bugs would recommend
Good game to play here n there no yap

This game is great to play but the bugs that you deal with are extremely painful and will over time bum you out.!   There's always some kind of bug and you'd think that after this many years, they'd have the bugs fixed.  So far I have managed to put 400 hours into this game and I would have put more into it except the game really hates allowing me to play.  At the moment I am currently dealing with an "Unknown Error" bug and it happens with or without friends.  I love playing games with friends but I know it's annoying to them when we sit in a lobby for 5-10 minutes and have to leave it because I couldn't connect to it.   If I am playing with friends, it makes it extremely hard to play with them since they will get into the lobby and I just get an "Unknown error" and disconnect from it.  The other bugs I am dealing with that are just as frustrating is that I can't hear when the killer is around  in some rounds since they have no heartbeat or music when near, the laggy skill checks that stutter, an disconnect errors when my internet connection is just fine, and getting stuck in areas of the lobby where the back button doesn't even work.   This game is extremely fun when it works, but the bugs really are bumming me out and making it difficult to continue playing the game.   I'm really hoping in the future they manage to fix them but after playing for 2 years and leaving for 3 months, not much has apparently changed.    I currently have a computer with an AMD 3900X / Nvidia 2070S / 32GB Ram / 1TB NVME Drive and I am plugged in via Ethernet Cable.   I have uninstalled and reinstalled but the same issue.  This is the ONLY game that I have issues like this so it's clearly not my computer.   Please fix this issue! 

Update - 11/1/21 - Finally went to play the game again and they finally fixed the bug that was causing the above issue.   The game is finally playable again.  There are still some bugs here and ther ebut they are much better than what I was dealing with originally.
great game, wait time for lobbys is a little meh, but the concept and gameplay are amazing
Shit my pants when im vibing as cheryl and nurse jumps me lmao
la trama y el sistema de juego es muy bueno, solo el match esta algo lento para entrar a partidas

Find me another game where you can play as Freddy Krueger - hunting a team consisting of Ash from Evil Dead, Cheryl Mason from Silent Hill, Bill Overbeck from Left 4 Dead, and Steve Harrington from Stranger Things - through the streets of Haddonfield on Halloween night.

I'll wait.
Although this game can make me extremely annoyed, there is nothing that beats the laughing with my friends after I lead the killer to them during a chase

The game itself is pretty fun. I dislike the Stranger Things Map quiet a bit. The issue and the reason why I give it a thumbs down is that I need a solid half an hour to an hour to find a game when I am not full premade so I gave up on this game. No idea whts wrong with the matchmaking, but its a shame, I really liked to play this.

I normally don't like PVP game but DBD is an exception. Very different and unique experience playing survivor vs killer. Lots of strategies and builds. Always keep you on your toes. 

However, it is not a really beginner-friendly game because of the horrible matchmaking. Lots of times you will be matched with super strong components that make the game experience very frustrating. Hopefully matchmaking can get fixed soon.
